login.description: Sign in to your PayPlan account

register.title: Create an account
register.description: Enter your details below to get started.

add_transaction_dialog.title: Add New Transaction
add_transaction_dialog.description: Fill in the details of your transaction below. Click save when you're done.
add_transaction_dialog.error_description: Could not save transaction. Please try again.

create_shared_expense_dialog.title: Create New Shared Expense
create_shared_expense_dialog.description: Fill in the details to split an expense.
create_shared_expense_dialog.participants_description: Select who is splitting this expense. You are automatically included.
create_shared_expense_dialog.error_total_mismatch: The sum of all amounts must equal the total amount.
create_shared_expense_dialog.not_auth_desc: You must be logged in to create a room.
create_shared_expense_dialog.failed_desc: An error occurred while creating the shared expense.

create_room_dialog.title: Create New Saving Room
create_room_dialog.description: Fill in the details to start a new shared saving goal.
create_room_dialog.participants_description: Select who is joining this saving goal. You are automatically included.
create_room_dialog.not_auth_desc: You must be logged in to create a room.
create_room_dialog.failed_desc: An error occurred while creating the room.

record_payment_dialog.title: Record Payment for {name}
record_payment_dialog.description: Enter the amount paid by the participant. This will be added to their paid total.
record_payment_dialog.error_positive_amount: Amount must be a positive number.
record_payment_dialog.error_amount_too_high: Amount cannot be greater than the amount due.

dashboard.no_expense_data: No expense data for this period.
dashboard.add_expense_prompt: Add an expense to see your breakdown.

saving_rooms.no_rooms_desc: Get started by creating a new room to share saving goals.
saving_rooms.created_toast_desc: The new saving room has been created successfully.

saving_room_details.payment_history_desc: A log of all payments recorded for this room.
saving_room_details.discussion_desc: Ask questions or post updates about this saving room.
saving_room_details.no_comments: No comments yet. Start the conversation!
saving_room_details.comment_login_error: You must be logged in to post a comment.
saving_room_details.payment_recorded_toast_desc: The payment has been recorded successfully.
saving_room_details.payment_breakdown_desc: Status of payments for each recurring period.

edit_room_dialog.title: Edit Saving Room
edit_room_dialog.description: Update the details of your saving room.

delete_room_dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this room?
delete_room_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the saving room and all of its data.

transactions_history.title: Your Transactions
transactions_history.description: Filter and search through all your recorded income and expenses.
transactions_history.no_filtered_transactions_desc: Try adjusting your search or filter settings.
